title: GlobalType needs your help
content:
Hello!

GlobalType wants to relaunch the existing website. I tried to explain what I want to do in my not-so-perfect English:

[http://youtu.be/eZ3VU1xM0aI](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015160450/http:/youtu.be/eZ3VU1xM0aI "http://youtu.be/eZ3VU1xM0aI")

You can find the project page on the German/American crowdfunding platform startnext:

It would be very kind of you if you could imagine to become a «fan» of the projekt so that it can reach the following step – the financing phase.

Best

Lars
author: Lars Kähler

comments.content:
Hello!

Now my project is in the funding phase at startnext. There is an English section (I did my very best) to explain what for I need this amount of money. I will collect til August 31, hoping that the sum of 2,200 € will arrive as soon as possible.

Think about what you can do to support this fascinating project!

Lars
